abstract: Gazebo in Cleveland park where 12-year-old Tamir Rice was fatally shot by police in 2014 is dismantled to be reconstructed as part of growing arts exhibition on Chicago's South Side.
lead_paragraph: The mother of Tamir, 12, who was fatally shot by the Cleveland police in 2014, has agreed to let the structure be used as part of an arts bank on Chicago’s South Side.
snippet: The mother of Tamir, 12, who was fatally shot by the Cleveland police in 2014, has agreed to let the structure be used as part of an arts bank on Chicago’s South Side....

headline.main: Cleveland Gazebo Where Tamir Rice Was Shot Will Be Moved to Chicago
headline.print_headline: Turning the Site of a Police Shooting Into ‘a Healing Space’
